my way through my studies.

he hold the pipe in his hand? Should he put

"I'm never going to smoke a pipe again."

to tell me a little story and believe you

I picked up the pipe I didn't know how to

know how to put it in my mouth.

was the way that Erickson worked. I never

you help me to stop smoking the pipe?"

problem, he worked on the emotional background.

and he changed the context. When he offered
